Class SelectionLineVisualization

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.visualizers.AbstractVisualization
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.visualizers.parallel.AbstractParallelVisualization<NumberVector<?,?>>
        • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.visualizers.parallel.selection.SelectionLineVisualization
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataStoreListener, ResultListener, Visualization, EventListener

    public class SelectionLineVisualization
extends AbstractParallelVisualization<NumberVector<?,?>>
implements DataStoreListener
    Visualizer for generating SVG-Elements representing the selected objects

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SelectionLineVisualization.Factory
      Factory for visualizers to generate an SVG-Element containing a cube as marker representing the selected range for each dimension
